# Importing libraries


# Loading the data

```{r}
## Locading the cleaned data sets
# Intial Survey

head(initial_clean)
```

```{r}
# Household Post-Survey

head(hs_post_clean)
```

```{r}
# Commercial & Insitution Post-Survey

head(ci_post_clean)
```
